description: Lines when transitioning to commercial breaks

lines.text: Alright folks, we're going to take a quick commercial break. Stay tuned, we'll be right back.
lines.voiceText: Alright folks, we're going to take a quick commercial break. Stay tuned, we'll be right back.

lines.text: Time for a short break. We'll be back in just a moment with more calls.
lines.voiceText: Time for a short break. We'll be back in just a moment with more calls.

lines.text: We're going to pause for our sponsors. Don't go anywhere, the truth waits for no one.
lines.voiceText: We're going to pause for our sponsors. Don't go anywhere, the truth waits for no one.

lines.text: Commercial break time. We'll return with more callers and more revelations.
lines.voiceText: Commercial break time. We'll return with more callers and more revelations.

lines.text: Taking a break now. Stay with us, folks. The night is just beginning.
lines.voiceText: Taking a break now. Stay with us, folks. The night is just beginning.

lines.text: WHOA! Commercial break! We'll be BACK with MORE!
lines.voiceText: WHOA! Commercial break! We'll be BACK with MORE!

lines.text: Taking a brief intermission. We'll resume the investigation shortly.
lines.voiceText: Taking a brief intermission. We'll resume the investigation shortly.

lines.text: Break time. Don't move. We'll be back.
lines.voiceText: Break time. Don't move. We'll be back.

lines.text: Ugh, commercial break. As if we need more interruptions.
lines.voiceText: Ugh, commercial break. As if we need more interruptions.

lines.text: Heh, time for a break. Don't worry, we'll be back with more craziness.
lines.voiceText: Heh, time for a break. Don't worry, we'll be back with more craziness.

lines.text: *yawn* Taking a break now. Wake me when we're back.
lines.voiceText: *yawn* Taking a break now. Wake me when we're back.

lines.voiceText: *yawn* We'll be right back... I think.

lines.text: Time for a break. Stay tuned.
lines.voiceText: Time for a break. Stay tuned.

lines.text: *grunt* Quick break coming up.
lines.voiceText: *grunt* Quick break coming up.

lines.text: We'll be right back after these messages.
lines.voiceText: We'll be right back after these messages.

lines.text: We'll be right back... eventually.
lines.voiceText: We'll be right back... eventually.

lines.text: Time for a break. I suppose.
lines.voiceText: Time for a break. I suppose.

lines.text: We'll be right back.

lines.text: We'll be right back – and it better be worth it!
lines.voiceText: We'll be right back – and it better be worth it!

lines.text: Time for a break! Don't go anywhere!
lines.voiceText: Time for a break! Don't go anywhere!

lines.text: We'll be right back after these damn messages!
lines.voiceText: We'll be right back after these damn messages!
